::Hevngjerrig::
       He looks around at the others in the room, namely Perceptor and 
Maxima.  "Hello.  I was once known as Aerotaur.  However that name no longer 
suits my purposes.  I am Hevngjerrig, Hevn, if you must shorten it.  And you 
are...?"

--part1_1e3.7db3655.2be09464_boundary
